properties.name: audit.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the audit framework.

properties.name: audit.capture.http.enabled
properties.description: Enable HTTP request/response capture.

properties.name: audit.capture.http.include-request-body
properties.description: Include request body in audit logs.

properties.name: audit.capture.http.include-response-body
properties.description: Include response body in audit logs.

properties.name: audit.capture.http.max-body-size
properties.description: Maximum size of request/response body to capture (bytes).

properties.name: audit.processing.mode
properties.description: Processing mode: SYNC or ASYNC.

properties.name: audit.processing.async.queue-capacity
properties.description: Capacity of async processing queue.

properties.name: audit.processing.async.worker-threads
properties.description: Number of worker threads for async processing.

properties.name: audit.processing.compliance.pii-masking.enabled
properties.description: Enable PII masking in audit logs.

properties.name: audit.processing.compliance.pii-masking.strategy
properties.description: PII masking strategy: HASH, MASK, or REDACT.

properties.name: audit.storage.type
properties.description: Storage type: DATABASE or FILE.

properties.name: audit.storage.database.auto-create-schema
properties.description: Automatically create audit tables on startup.

properties.name: audit.storage.database.partitioning.enabled
properties.description: Enable table partitioning.

properties.name: audit.storage.database.partitioning.strategy
properties.description: Partitioning strategy: DAILY, MONTHLY, or YEARLY.

properties.name: audit.storage.database.retention.default-days
properties.description: Default retention period in days.

properties.name: audit.reporting.api.enabled
properties.description: Enable audit REST API.

properties.name: audit.reporting.api.base-path
properties.description: Base path for audit API endpoints.

properties.name: audit.reporting.ui.enabled
properties.description: Enable audit dashboard UI.

properties.name: audit.reporting.ui.path
properties.description: Path for audit dashboard.

properties.name: audit.integrity.hashing.enabled
properties.description: Enable hash chaining for tamper detection.

properties.name: audit.integrity.hashing.algorithm
properties.description: Hashing algorithm.

properties.name: audit.processing.compliance.regulations
properties.description: CBN or NDPA.
